O Portal da Transparência é uma iniciati: The Transparency Portal is an initiative of Cachoeiro de Itapemirim City Hall so that the cachoeirenses see and understand the information of the city hall, making possible that can exercise the social control, that is, question and evaluate the revenues, expenses, bids and contracts.
Assim, conseguiremos com o APOIO DO CIDA: Therefore, we will succeed with the CITIZEN SUPPORT and the continuous improvement of TRANSPARENCY, spend better the public resources, and have better health, education, safety and construction services.
O Portal da Transparência contém dados e: The Transparency Portal contains data and information on the following subjects:
Receitas que a prefeitura lança e arreca: Revenues that the city hall launches and collects;
Gastos públicos de cada órgão da prefeit: Public expenses of each public agency of the city hall;
Compras que os órgãos realizam;: Purchases that the public agencies perform;
Informações da Gestão fiscal da Prefeitu: Information about the fiscal management of the City Hall;
Relatórios de auditoria e inspeção da Co: Audit and inspection reports of the Internal Controller of Government;
Informações dos servidores públicos e re: Information about the public servers and remuneration;
Recursos que a União e o Estado transfer: Resources that the Union and the State transfer to the city hall;
Convênios que o município faz com entida: Agreements that the municipality makes with entities;
Informações de obra executadas pela Pref: Informations about constructions executed by the City Hall;
Planejamento e resultados dos Poderes do: Planning and results of State's Powers;
Download de todas as informações em dado: Download all information in open data.
1. A quem se aplica a LRF?: 1.  To whom does the LRF apply?
A LRF aplica-se à União, aos Estados, ao: The LRF applies to the Union, the States, the Federal District and the Municipalities, including the Legislative Powers - in this included the Courts of Accounts -, Executive and Judiciary, the respective direct administrations, funds, autarchies, foundations and dependents state-owned companies. (article 1, paragraph 2)
É aquela atividade de prestação ou execu: It is that activity of rendering or execution of public services made by the own public agencies that are part of the structure of the administrative. They are the Municipal Secretariats, the directorship, the departments, the sectors, among others public agencies providers or executors of service.
Fundo, na administração pública, é o pro: Fund in the public administration is the product of specified revenues that, by law, are linked to the realization of certain objectives or services, which is optional the adoption of peculiars rules of application. The municipalities have several funds set up, such as the municipal social assistance fund and the municipal health fund. These funds are part of the municipal budget (article 71, of Law 4,320 / 64).
São as empresas controladas que recebam: These are the subsidiaries companies that receive from the controlling entity financial resources for the payment of personnel expenses or general or capital expenses, except in the latter case, those arising from an increase in equity interest. (articles 2, I and II)
5. O que se entende por receita corrente: 5. What is understood by net current revenue, in the case of the Municipalities?
Receita Corrente Líquida é a soma de tod: Net Current Revenue is the sum of all current revenue (tributary, from contributions, assets, industrial, agricultural, from services, current transfers) collected in the specific month and in the previous eleven, deducted: a) the contribution of the public servers to the costing of their social security system and social assistance and the revenues coming from the financial compensation referred in paragraph 9 of the Constitution; b) the duplicated revenues; c) and, finally, to consider in the calculation the net income of FUNDEF. (article 2, IV, and paragraph 1)
6. O que é o Plano Plurianual – PPA?: 6. What is the Pluriannual Plan – PPA?
De acordo com a Constituição Federal, o: According to the Federal Constitution, the PPA is the budgetary instrument designed to establish the guidelines, objectives and public administration goals of the federated entities for capital expenditures (relative to investments) and others expenditures resulting from them and those relating to programs of continuous duration (article 165, paragraph 1). It shall be valid for a period of 4 (four) years, which will expire at the end of the first financial exercise of the Mayor's mandate (article 35, paragraph 2, I of the ADCT). Moreover, it is the exclusive competence of the Heads of the Executive Power the initiative such a bill.
7. O que é a Lei de Diretrizes Orçamentá: 7. What is Law of Budgetary Guidelines - LDO?
Também de acordo com a Constituição Fede: Also in accordance with the Federal Constitution, the LDO aims to indicate the goals and priorities of the public administration of the federated entities including capital expenses for the following financial exercise, being that it will guide the preparation of the LOA, will deal with the changes in the tax legislation and also, to the federal level, will establish the policy of the official financial agencies of development (article 165, paragraph 2). Its validity is annual. The LRF predicted integration into the LDO of the fiscal targets attachments and fiscal risks, assigning to each attachment a specific content. (Article 4, paragraphs 1, 2 and 3)
8. Para que serve o anexo de metas fisca: 8. What is for the fiscal targets attachment?
O anexo de metas fiscais serve para aval: The fiscal targets attachment serves to assessment of compliance with fiscal targets of the previous three fiscal exercises and to demonstrate what is planned for the current fiscal exercise and for the following two in financial terms involving revenues, expenses, nominal and primary results and amount of public debt, including with memory and calculation methodology, besides the demonstration of evolution of the net equity of the last three exercises, of the evaluation of the financial and actuarial of the own pension's regime, of the estimate and compensation of the renunciation of revenue and of the expansion margin of compulsory expenses of a continuing character. (article 4, paragraphs 2 and 3)
Resultado Primário é a diferença entre a: Primary result is the difference between budget revenues and budget expenses, deducting from the budgetary revenues those revenues of a financial nature (revenues from financial investments and credit operations) and from budget expenses those expenses with amortization and interest of internal and external public debt, acquisition of capital representative securities already paid in and relatives to the granting of loans.
Resultado Nominal é a diferença entre a: Nominal Result is the difference between the variation of net fiscal debt between two periods.
